items.title: After 50 Years, Walmart Just Announced Its Most Meaningful Change Yet
items.description: The company is extending its employee discount to cover the thing that matters most.

items.title: How to Unplug During Vacation and Not Feel Guilty About It
items.description: On paper, it might seem like a no-brainer to simply stop working and relax, but that rarely happens.

items.title: Why Strategic Change Outperforms Drastic Overhauls
items.description: The companies winning big aren’t changing everything, but they are changing the right things.

items.description: If you’re a conscious entrepreneur who has hit an invisible ceiling, it’s time to reevaluate your operating system.

items.title: This AI-Platform Ensures Your Next Startup Idea Is Original
